about: Frontend at new blr startup starting in May
description:
Looking for a Visual Designer with experience in creating digital assets for products and marketing for an international client (startup). 
The work may involve slight adjustment of time-zones, and will be mostly WFH and high-degree of autonomy (for creative decisions, as well as timelines) - with occasional long meetings and daily stand-ups for general awareness and team-sync.

If anybody fits the profile, please DM me. 
Or, if any of your friends fit the profile, ask them to join server, and then DM me.

Thanks, have a nice day!

PS: please know this as a dedicated and full-time job, not particularly looking for contract based fiverr/upwork engagements per se. That said, a person currently doing so and looking for permanent/long-term job is not barred either.
